message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.GR

The paper proposes a deep learning method for obtaining control policies for virtual autonomous agents by directly mimicking raw video demonstrations. This involves joint learning of feature extraction and reward estimation steps using Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs). The paper also discusses the equivalence between adversarial imitation learning on video demonstrations and learning from state trajectories. Based on these aspects, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, since the paper deals with control policies for autonomous agents, it could also belong to cs.RO (Robotics) and cs.GR (Graphics).
